metadata.title: CVE-2023-41886 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS for NVIDIA BlueField (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: OpenRefine is a powerful free, open source tool for working with messydata. Prior to version 3.7.5, an arbitrary file read vulnerability allowsany unauthenticated user to read a file on a server. Version 3.7.5 fixesthis issue.

criterions.comment: openrefine package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
